description:
Climbing tomorrow, hiking next weekend, dream backpacking trip in a few months... playing outdoors can get complicated. Simplify things a bit with these versatile softshell pants. Tough, lightweight and beautifully constructed, the Gamma LT pants have you covered for a wide range of activities. They're cut to accommodate dynamic movements, with articulated tailoring and plenty of stretch. The fit is close to the body with a straight leg, with a low profile brushed-back waistband that lies comfortably under a pack. Drawstring adjustable cuffs can be tightened to keep out bugs and trail debris or hiked up out of the way for climbing.

  • Fortius™ DW 2.0 fabric is lightweight, durable and DWR-treated for water resistance
  • Soft, brushed polyester-lined waist has an integrated adjustable webbing belt
  • Zip fly
  • 2 mesh-lined hand pockets with laminated zip closure
  • Thigh pocket with laminated zip
  • Gusseted crotch, articulated knee and stretch for freedom of movement
  • Straight leg
  • Reflective logo
name: Arc'teryx Gamma Pant - Women's
